alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 05 at 11:54AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kings, western Tulare and southern Fresno Counties through 1245 PM PST... At 1154 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stratford, or about 9 miles southwest of Hanford, moving to the northeast at around 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hanford, Lemoore, Stratford, Armona, Home Garden and Laton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
